page.title: 19THE CLAYPITS
page.content:
We went to visit{Ramsey Claypits,}a few miles away.It was cool and misty with a gentle breeze and the sky was grey.There was a house called the hopper and the bricks were coloured orange, yellow, cream,black, white, grey and brown. We went to look for { {minibeasts}and we saw a slug, snail, an earthworm, an ant, a bee, a fly, a hoverfly, a gnat, a daddy long legs and a ground beetle. We did a bark rubbing of a walnut tree and we saw two baby owls in a tree. After dinner we went{pond dipping}and looking for {wild flowers}and{mammal tracking}and {bird watching.}Then we went home.
(Middle infants aged 6 years)
